text: Meredith Louise Vieira (born December 30, 1953 in East Providence, Rhode Island, United States of America) is an American journalist, television personality and a game show host. She was the host of the syndicated version of Who Wants to Be a Millionaire. She was a co-host on the ABC talk show The View. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Writers from Providence, Rhode Island Category:American journalists Category:American game show hosts Category:American television personalities Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Television talk show hosts
title: Meredith Vieira
